Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: Mali’s neighbour; 66; white; teacher. Friendly; has known Mali for years. Brown hair, thinning on top; glasses. Looks his age. Trousers, shirts and jumpers; brown lace-up shoes. Not trendy! English, slight Derbyshire accent, but he’s lived in Oxford since he left university.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description
Field.Value: 30; woman; mixed-race (Afro-Caribbean and white); employed by a low-cost airline, she likes her job at the check-in desk at the airport. She’s quite conventional, lower middle-class. Friendly and professional. Smart, quite a lot of make-up. Wears uniform: white shirt with neckscarf, blue jacket and straight skirt. Black tights and high-heeled black shoes. English. London accent.
